        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Webquest sul bullismo</string>
            <string language="en">Webquest on Bullying</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest auf dem Tyrannisieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest sur intimider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest em bullying</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquest στη φοβέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Webquest en bullying</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Sviluppare la consapevolezza nelle scuole sul problema del bullismo.</string>
            <string language="en">Developing awareness at schools on the problem of bullying.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sich entwickelndes Bewußtsein an den Schulen auf 
dem Problem des Tyrannisierens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conscience se développante aux écoles sur le 
problème d'intimider.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Consciência tornando-se em escolas no problema de
bullying.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη της συνειδητοποίησης στα σχολεία στο 
πρόβλημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conocimiento que se convierte en las escuelas en 
el problema de bullying.</string>
          </description>
